feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Hotfix Backend
New release for Postiz: Fixed TikTok and Bluesky + added actions to build arm64
New release for Postiz: v1.38.1
entry.content:
Whats changed

  • Fixed aws-sdk and peer conflicts by @talkenigs
  • Caching for Jenkins by @egelhaus

What's Changed (PRs)

  • Fix aws-sdk & langcahin/community peer dependencies conflicts by @talkenigs in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/683
  • Jenk cache by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/688
  • fix conflicts (override "dev" package jsons with "main" package jsons) by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/694
  • WIP: v1.38.1 by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/674

New Contributors

  • @talkenigs made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/683

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.37.4...v1.38.1

entry.title: New release for Postiz: MCP initial release
entry.content:
What's Changed

You can now connect your claude / cursor to Postiz. Check it in the public API.

  • First version of MCPs by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/698 Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.38.2...v1.39.0

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix package json for MCPs
